## Deal With Data

```{r}
# Get data
spotify <- read.csv("spotify_norm.csv")
```


## Build SVM Model

```{r}
# Create model
library(caret)
set.seed(300)
fitControl <- trainControl(method = "cv", number = 10)
svm_mod <- train(form = as.factor(target) ~ ., data = spotify_train_norm, trControl = fitControl, method = "svmLinear")
svm_mod

# Obtain predictions
svm_predictions <- predict(svm_mod, spotify_train_norm, type = "raw")
svm_predictions

# Evaluate model
confusionMatrix(as.factor(svm_predictions), as.factor(spotify_train_norm$target), positive = "1")
```
